column5: This might be a long shot but I was hoping to bring the family up there for some good fishing. I would need a cabin and a boat 2-3 days. Would it be unrealistic to think I could get one later this week or weekend on such short notice? You guys recommend anywhere in particular. I heard it is beautiful up there. I live in London and would take the road up from Grand Bend.

here is a link to cedar grove camp on cameron lake,it says they have a cabin available on the 25th. beautiful area,the prices are very reasonable and they also reny boats and canoes.  http://www.cedargrovecottages.com/index.html
